name: FourSeasonsofFilm
0:
”Alexa, open Four Seasons of Film”
”Alexa, start Four Seasons of Film”
”Alexa, ask Four Seasons of Film”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: four seasons of film
Developer Terms of Use
des:
There are Four Seasons of Film and they'll cover them all. Hosts Nathan Robert Blackburn and Scotty Brown are award-winning independent filmmakers reading the marketing reports, eyeing the current trends and helping you, the listener, bet on the right movie to buy tickets to. Join the discussion every week as they review new releases at the box office. Imagine Siskel and Ebert with on-set experience. It's the time of the season and the season starts now.

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Four Seasons of Film to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Four Seasons of Film to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
